item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Sun! I’m a backend developer with a passion for low level development. I enjoy working on embedded systems and creating binary applications that can run on a variety of platforms. I’m skilled in using Python and NodeJS for backends and C, C++, and Rust for low level development. I also use Golang and Python for common everyday tasks. I’ve always been fascinated by how technology works, and I love the challenge of working on low level development projects.

item.title: Projects
item.description: I’ve worked on a variety of projects over the years, ranging from web applications to low-level systems programming. Here are a few examples of my recent work: 1. CodeBin - Python/Flask/React This project is a code sharing site similar to Pastebin, where users can share snippets of code with others. I built the backend with Python and Flask, which provides a simple and flexible framework for building web applications. For the frontend, I used React to create a modern and responsive user interface.

item.title: Contact
item.description: I’m always interested in connecting with fellow developers, potential employers, or anyone who shares a passion for technology. If you’d like to get in touch with me, please use one of the methods listed below: Email: contact.sunpodder09@gmail.com LinkedIn: Sun Podder GitHub: @SunPodder Facebook: @sun.podder.09 Feel free to reach out to me with any questions or comments, or to inquire about potential collaboration opportunities. I’ll do my best to respond as quickly as possible.
